thread.title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens': Watch the third trailer now
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens': Watch the third trailer now

author: Ben Flanagan | bflanagan@al.com
title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens': Watch the third trailer now
text:
Comments 
"Monday Night Football" likely got an even bigger boost in ratings thanks to ESPN's parent company Disney opting to show a third trailer for "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" during halftime of the broadcast. 
With the Philadelphia Eagles leading the New York Giants 17-7 at halftime, the reason lots of people tuned in finally reared its head as the latest trailer for J.J. Abrams stab at the saga showed. 
Guess what? It looks rad. Like, really rad. Like no other "Star Wars" movie that came before it but with as much reverence as possible to the original trilogy. 
But we haven't seen the movie yet. Remember the prequels Measured expectations, measured expectations. Oh, who cares? It looks awesome. 
Watch the third trailer for "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" below:
